name: Kingdom Decay: Invasion of the Rythmic Army
name_original: Kingdom Decay: Invasion of the Rythmic Army
description:
Kingdom Decay: Invasion of the Rythmic Army

I made this game for the 1-Button Jam 2019. 

Use 1 button to save the kingdom from the Rythmic Army!

Use attack to destroy your enemies, use magic to fire them all and use defense to protect and heal you.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sorry about my bad english. I'm a spanish programmer.

Music by:

"All that" - BendSound

"Burlao" - Shot Records

"Vivaldi" - Prototyperator

"Basic_Metal_6" - TeknoAXE

Thanks to my friend Cell and my girlfriend Pilar for the support!
